speaker: Shivani Patel
title: OSS Framework Support in Azure Machine Learning Service
description:
Learn how Azure ML supports Open Source ML Frameworks and MLflow in AzureML. We'll walk through a ScikitLearn and Pytorch example to show the built in support for ML frameworks. We'll also go over how you can take these examples and easily track your artifacts with MLflow.

Learn More:
